alert.note: Alert for Eastern Pendleton; Western Grant; Western Mineral; Western Pendleton (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 12 at 9:56PM EDT until March 13 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...In Maryland, Extreme Western Allegany and Garrett Counties. In Virginia, Western Highland and Eastern Highland Counties. In West Virginia, Western Mineral, Western Grant, Eastern Pendleton and Western Pendleton Counties. * WHEN...Until 1 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Pendleton; Western Grant; Western Mineral; Western Pendleton
